abstract: Microsoft said Saturday that it was abandoning its blockbuster bid to acquire Yahoo after the two companies could not agree on a price. (Read Microsoft’s letter here.)
lead_paragraph: Microsoft said Saturday that it was abandoning its blockbuster bid to acquire Yahoo after the two companies could not agree on a price. (Read Microsoft’s letter here.)

abstract: Talk about a Saturday night special. Microsoft said tonight that it is withdrawing its offer to buy Yahoo, one it had only recently raised.
lead_paragraph: Talk about a Saturday night special. Microsoft said tonight that it is withdrawing its offer to buy Yahoo, one it had only recently raised.

abstract: Microsoft insisted that it would acquire Yahoo only on its own terms. Now it said that it will withdraw its offer, after the Internet giant rebuffed a sweetened $33-a-share bid.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft insisted that it would acquire Yahoo only on its own terms. Now it said that it will withdraw its offer, after the Internet giant rebuffed a sweetened $33-a-share bid.

abstract: It has always been a bit of a mystery why Microsoft didn’t immediately go fully hostile on Yahoo after the first round of letters and Yahoo’s initial rejection. This would have involved a proxy contest and an exchange offer.
lead_paragraph: It has always been a bit of a mystery why Microsoft didn’t immediately go fully hostile on Yahoo after the first round of letters and Yahoo’s initial rejection. This would have involved a proxy contest and an exchange offer.

headline.main: MicroHoo: The End of the Beginning
